boardMembers.name: Jane Doe
boardMembers.bio: Jane has been leading E3 Kenya's initiatives for over 5 years, focusing on sustainable community development and women's empowerment.

boardMembers.name: John Smith
boardMembers.bio: With over 10 years of experience in NGO management, John oversees the day-to-day operations and project implementation.

boardMembers.name: Sarah Johnson
boardMembers.bio: Sarah works directly with local communities to ensure our initiatives meet their needs and create lasting impact.
